header_text: You pride yourself on remembering acquaintances' names. You and your partner throw a cocktail party, but you can't remember a few of your guests' names. Forgetting their names makes you upset.

elements.text: You and your partner develop a system to help jog your memory. Having your partner there to help you remember people's names allows you to enjoy the party and feel more...

elements.name: You pride yourself on remembering acquaintances' names. You and your partner throw a cocktail party, but you can't remember a few of your guests' names. Forgetting their names makes you upset._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
